Name: Special Provisions for the Representation of Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes
ArtDesc: Ensures representation for Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes in legislatures.

Name: Special Provisions for the Educationally Backward Classes
ArtDesc: Provides for special provisions for educationally backward classes.

Name: Provisions for the Development of Minorities
ArtDesc: Mandates provisions for the development of minorities.

Name: Power of the State to Make Laws
ArtDesc: Empowers the State to make laws for various subjects.

Name: Power of the Parliament to Make Laws
ArtDesc: Grants Parliament the power to legislate on certain subjects.

Name: Provisions for the Administration of Union Territories
ArtDesc: Specifies provisions for administering Union Territories.

Name: Special Provisions for the Governance of Union Territories
ArtDesc: Mandates special governance provisions for Union Territories.

Name: Transitional Provisions for the Governance of Union Territories
ArtDesc: Details transitional provisions for governing Union Territories.

Name: Power to Make Regulations for Union Territories
ArtDesc: Empowers the President to make regulations for Union Territories.

Name: Constitutional Amendments
ArtDesc: Outlines the process for amending the Constitution.

Name: Provisions for Financial Matters
ArtDesc: Specifies provisions regarding financial matters in the Constitution.

Name: Provisions for State Finance
ArtDesc: Details provisions concerning state finances.

Name: Provisions for the Financial Stability of Union Territories
ArtDesc: Ensures financial stability for Union Territories.

Name: Establishment of a Finance Commission
ArtDesc: Provides for the establishment of a Finance Commission.

Name: Composition of the Finance Commission
ArtDesc: Outlines the composition of the Finance Commission.

Name: Functions of the Finance Commission
ArtDesc: Details the functions of the Finance Commission.

Name: Procedure for Financial Matters
ArtDesc: Specifies the procedure to be followed in financial matters.

Name: Power to Make Rules for the Conduct of Business
ArtDesc: Empowers the Parliament to make rules for conducting business.

Name: Procedure for the Transaction of Business
ArtDesc: Outlines the procedure for the transaction of business in Parliament.

Name: Provisions for the Effective Implementation of Laws
ArtDesc: Ensures effective implementation of laws passed by Parliament.

Name: Special Provisions for the Scheduled Areas
ArtDesc: Mandates special provisions for scheduled areas.

Name: Special Provisions for the Scheduled Tribes
ArtDesc: Specifies special provisions for the welfare of Scheduled Tribes.

Name: Power to Delegate Legislative Authority
ArtDesc: Empowers the Parliament to delegate legislative authority.

Name: Provisions for Inter-State Council
ArtDesc: Provides for the establishment of an Inter-State Council.

Name: Provisions for the Distribution of Revenue
ArtDesc: Specifies provisions for revenue distribution among states.

Name: Power of the President to Call for Information
ArtDesc: Empowers the President to call for information from states.

Name: Special Provisions for Certain States
ArtDesc: Provides for special provisions for certain states.

Name: Power to Declare Certain Areas as Scheduled Areas
ArtDesc: Empowers the President to declare certain areas as scheduled areas.

Name: Special Provisions for the Representation of Women
ArtDesc: Mandates provisions for the representation of women.

Name: Power to Review Legislative Measures
ArtDesc: Empowers the Parliament to review legislative measures.

Name: Provisions for the Administration of Justice
ArtDesc: Specifies provisions for administering justice.

Name: Special Provisions for the Judiciary
ArtDesc: Mandates special provisions for the judiciary.

Name: Power of the State to Appoint Officers
ArtDesc: Empowers the State to appoint officers.

Name: Provisions for the Appointment of Governors
ArtDesc: Specifies provisions for the appointment of governors.

Name: Power to Remove Governors
ArtDesc: Empowers the President to remove governors.

Name: Power to Appoint Commissions
ArtDesc: Empowers the President to appoint commissions for various purposes.

Name: Provisions for the Delegation of Powers
ArtDesc: Specifies provisions for delegating powers.

Name: Provisions for the Establishment of Advisory Councils
ArtDesc: Provides for establishing advisory councils.

Name: Power to Appoint Advisory Councils
ArtDesc: Empowers the President to appoint advisory councils.

Name: Special Provisions for Certain Categories
ArtDesc: Provides for special provisions for certain categories.

Name: Provisions for the Review of Laws
ArtDesc: Specifies provisions for reviewing laws.
